election_record.label: New York 1795 Lieutenant Governor

sub_unit.name: Kings
sub_unit.note: Weekly Museum lists 177 votes for Stephen Van Rensselaer III.

sub_unit.name: Suffolk
sub_unit.note: Greenleafs The New-York Journal, and Patriotic Register (New York, NY). lists 897 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Westchester
sub_unit.note: Greenleafs New York Journal and The Weekly Museum (New York, NY) list 498 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Dutchess
sub_unit.note: Greenleafs New York Journal and The Herald lists 1117 votes for Stephen Van Rensselaer III.
Greenleafs New York Journal and The Herald lists 1088 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Ulster
sub_unit.note: The Rising Sun lists 750 votes for Stephen Van Rensselear. The Greenleafs New York Journal lists 757 votes for Stephen Van Rensselear III.
The Rising Sun, The Weekly Museum (New York, NY) and Greenleafs New York Journal list 1191 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Hurley
sub_unit.note: The Rising Sun lists 28 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Columbia
sub_unit.note: The American Minerva and Greenleafs New York Journal lists 1389 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Clinton
sub_unit.note: Daily Advertiser and Greenleafs New York Journal lists 93 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Peru
sub_unit.note: Daily Advertiser and Greenleafs New York Journal lists 34 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: One
sub_unit.note: The Daily Advertiser and The Annals of Albany list 86 votes for Stephen Van Rensselaer III.

sub_unit.name: Bethlehem
sub_unit.note: Greenleafs New York Journal lists 207 votes for Stephen Van Rensselaer III.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: The Greenleefs New York Journal lists 431 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Whitestown
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) list 96 votes for Stephen Van Rensselaer III.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY) lists 791 votes for William Floyd.

sub_unit.name: Unknown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the town where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.

sub_unit.name: Unkown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the town where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.

sub_unit.name: Unknown
sub_unit.note: "The Inspectors returned the votes without mentioning the town where they were taken." The Albany Gazette (Albany, NY). June 12, 1795.
